tool.name: Kernel Density Estimation
tool.description: Kernel density estimation. If any point is currently in selection only selected points are taken into account.<br/><br/>References:<br/>- Fotheringham, A.S., Brunsdon, C., Charlton, M. (2000): Quantitative Geography. Sage. 270p.<br/>- Lloyd, C.D. (2010): Spatial data analysis - An introduction for GIS users. Oxford. 206p.<br/>

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids
